text: Violations of Muis regulations with Halal produce mixed with PORK items. See pictures.  Muslims should avoid getting fresh/frozen produce here. Shame on the management for not looking at this.
Stocks are not kept in a cool and safe environment. Shop at your own risk.

Rude staff.
Today 1 May 2024.
Time 5:15pm
i am at the noodles section looking what to buy, the staff is topping up rice section. I didn know
she need me to move away for her to top up. When i turn my head over to her side, i saw her give me black face and angry eyes. What did i do to deserve this?
i wanted to buy some noodles only if u needed the space can just ask politely why need give me that stare?
Please give yr staff some basic manner training. she the one wear spectacles old auntie not from local.

Chinese cashier lady in mid-20s, mentally challenged (I think) is getting too rude. Work attitude is horrible. Throws your purchases down on counter after scanning, does not pack your groceries even when your own bag has been passed in advance. Watches some video on her mobile when serving a customer!
It's been a while since she has been doing this but now it's way HORRIBLE.

There is a very rude cashier staff who just squats behind the counter on her phone. Had to call out to her before she stands up and starts scanning the items with an annoyed attitude. Also expects the customer
to stretch over the counter to make payment on the terminal.
